item.title: CVE-2023-38000|2024-08-02T17:23:27.829Z -- gutenberg%20team -- gutenberg
item.description: Auth. Stored (contributor+) Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WordPress coreÂ 6.3 through 6.3.1, from 6.2 through 6.2.2, from 6.1 through 6.1.3, from 6.0 through 6.0.5, from 5.9 through 5.9.7 and Gutenberg plugin <= 16.8.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-37492|2024-08-02T03:57:39.608Z -- gutenberg%20team -- gutenberg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Gutenberg Team Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gutenberg: from n/a through 18.6.0.
